title: Did the New York Times contradict their 20 January 2017 report on wiretapping?
subtitle: A picture showing the front page of The New York Times along with statements accusing the publication of contradictory reports of wiretapping was distributed to social media.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The New York Times contrasts their 20 January 2017 wiretap report in an article entitled "Trump, show no evidence, Obama says to connect his phones."
